trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around August 1st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsLast August while living in Portland, Oregon, I attempted to take a picture of the meteoroid shower at 3:15 am with my arm extended out of the bathroom window. My Digital Camera picked up the following attached image. The next day I sent this photo to the local TV Station, KGW they never acknowledged this, neither did several other email contacts. Now I live in Idaho Falls, and the other night I was watching UFO's on the A&E channel where I was reminded of this photo I took. "Please relate if anyone has seen a similar object. As this is an authentic exposure taken in Portland, Oregon during the August nightly meteoroid showers. Thank You
